text: The 2018–19 season was SD Eibar's 79th season in existence and the club's 5th consecutive season in the top flight of Spanish football. ==Players== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Date !Player !From !Type !Fee !Ref |- | 27 April 2018 || Fabián Orellana || Valencia || Transfer || €2,000,000 || |- | 30 June 2018 || Bebé || Rayo Vallecano ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 30 June 2018 || Unai Elgezabal || Numancia ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 30 June 2018 || Álex Gálvez || Las Palmas ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 30 June 2018 || Pablo Hervías || Valladolid ||colspan=2|Loan return||El Pucela elige a Hervías y Hervías elige al Pucela (Pucela elect Hervías and Hervías elects Pucela);
